name: Kathmandu
description: The capital city of Nepal, Kathmandu is a cultural hub with a rich history, ancient temples, and bustling markets. It serves as a gateway to exploring Nepal's diverse landscapes and traditions.

name: Pokhara
description: Pokhara is a picturesque city known for its stunning lakes, panoramic views of the Annapurna range, and adventure sports. It is a popular destination for trekking, paragliding, and relaxation by the lakeside.

name: Nagarkot
description: Nagarkot is a hill station renowned for its breathtaking sunrise and sunset views over the Himalayas, including Mount Everest. It is a peaceful retreat just a short drive from Kathmandu.

name: Ilam Chiya Bagan
description: Ilam is famous for its lush tea gardens that stretch across rolling hills. It is a serene destination known for its natural beauty, tea plantations, and vibrant cultural heritage.

name: Mustang
description: Mustang, also known as the 'Forbidden Kingdom,' is a remote and culturally rich region in the Himalayas. It is famous for its unique landscapes, ancient monasteries, and Tibetan-influenced culture.

name: Mount Everest
description: Mount Everest, the highest peak in the world, attracts climbers and trekkers from around the globe. The Everest Base Camp trek is one of the most popular trekking routes, offering stunning views and a challenging adventure.

name: Lumbini
description: Lumbini is the birthplace of Lord Buddha and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is a significant pilgrimage site with ancient temples, monasteries, and the sacred Lumbini Garden.

name: Chitwan National Park
description: Chitwan National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the best places for wildlife safaris in Asia. It is home to endangered species like the one-horned rhinoceros and Bengal tiger.
